name: Clean The Seas
description:
Welcome To Clean The Seas!

In this game you will spawn in a beach! but, our beach and seas is so dirty with the garbage! so, to save the seas you will be cleaning the seas!

This Game Is Still In Development! Bug may occur in gameplay!
